name: Google Drive Search Files
description: Searches for files in Google Drive based on a query string.

inputs.name: endpoint
inputs.description: The Google Drive API endpoint to call

inputs.name: q
inputs.description: The search query combining one or more search terms (e.g., 'name contains "report"')

inputs.name: fields
inputs.description: Specifies which fields to include in the response

inputs.name: pageSize
inputs.description: The maximum number of files to return per page

inputs.name: pageToken
inputs.description: The token for continuing a previous list request on the next page

inputs.name: includeTrash
inputs.description: Whether to include files in the trash (default: false)
